ValidationRule.description: Payroll Run Date can not be blank, if transferred to payroll specialist
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISNULL( Date_xferred_to_PR_Specialist__c ) ) && ISNULL( Payroll_Run_Date__c ) && (NOT( BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ***** Payroll Run Date can not be blank, if transferred to payroll specialist ****
